Posts.Content: I had a full mastectomy and 5 lymph nodes removed 7 and a half weeks ago but the pain in my arm pit is still quite bad and it is still filling up with fluid that seems to agrivate the muscles in my arm shoulder and arm pit. All the doctor says is pain is good ( really I would love to kick him where it hurts and see if he says the same thing again ) any advise.
Posts.Title: How long dose the pain last
